dialogue.introduction: Pyan♪ The fourth Agano class Light Cruiser, Sakawa! Commander, nice to meet you!
dialogue.library_intro: I'm Sakawa, the 4th ship and the youngest of the Agano-class light cruiser sisters. I was born too late, so I couldn't go outside much. I wanted to go together with Yahagi-chan... but I ended up guarding Maizuru.
dialogue.secretary1: Pya! You called for me? Whats the matter? An order?
dialogue.secretary3: Commander! I like you! Cross...roads? What's that? I don't know what it is...but don't think I like it!
dialogue.secretaryidle: Sakawa...will always be here waiting for you, Commander, always, always waiting...
dialogue.secretarymarried: Commander, aren't you working a bit too hard? If you're tired, wanna have some rest together with Sakawa? Admiral, you are working hard as always, so amazing.Should I massage your shoulders? I am good at it.Pyon! Pyan! How is it?
dialogue.wedding: Commander, I'm always saying things like PyuUu or PyaAaa to you but...what I'm actually trying so hard to say is I'm really thankyouthankyouthankyou!...eh? You can understand? Really!? I love you too! Pyaaaa~!
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: Yay~! It's my turn! Flagship of the Torpedo Squadron, Sakawa! Moving out!
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Rest a little bit~, Eh? I looked like a special transport ship? No, no!
dialogue.ship_construction: Someone newer than me has arrived!
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Light Cruiser Sakawa, setting sail! Watch me closely!
dialogue.night_battle: Night battle? I've always wanted to try it!
dialogue.mvp: Pyaaa! Sakawa is number one!? Yay~! Count on Sakawa next time as well!
dialogue.minor_damaged2: Pyaa!? The fire, I have to extinguish the fire!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Pyaaaaa, the turret, the turret is gone!
dialogue.sunk: Why...I wanted to...go together with...Yahagi-chan and everyone...
dialogue.christmas_2015: Sakawa is not cold at all. Maizuru is little bit colder than that. Pyaa!
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: Spring cleaning! I need to tidy up my room. Pyun~♪. Ahh... I can't reach the top shelves~~!
dialogue.new_year_2016: Pyaa, pyaaa ♪ Happy New Year! Commander, take care of me this year, too! Waah, this New Year's food, looks delicious ♪
dialogue.setsubun_2016: PYA! Ah... Yahagi seems to be mad for some reason. I wonder why? Hm, Houshou-san. This is... an Ehoumaki? I guess I eat this in one go?

hourly.0100: It's 1 A.M! The night begins from now~! PyaAaa...I'm sleepy...
hourly.0400: 4:00A.M.? Eeh...4 O'clock. is fine?...OK! It's 4 O'clock.
hourly.0500: 5:00A.M...It's already 5 huh...What are you working so hard for Admiral? What's a daily?
hourly.0600: 6:00A.M...by the way..! Aaah! Sakawa should be responsible for the hourlies today.
hourly.0800: 8:00A.M.! Today Admiral is awesome as well.
hourly.0900: 9:00A.M. Today Sakawa will stick with you as well.
hourly.1000: 10:00A.M. Sakawa quiz~ the thing Sakawa likes, what might it be~
hourly.1100: It's 11 A.M. what about your lunch? Eh? The answer for the quiz? What was it again...?
hourly.1200: It's noon~! Wanna grab something to eat? Heey Admiral~...good idea right?
hourly.1300: It's 1 P.M.! The answer for the quiz?...Erm...well...it's right in my sight...right?
hourly.1400: It's 2 P.M. dummy dummy Admiral~! The answer is not ramen! It's you Admiral!
hourly.1600: It's 4 P.M. Admiral~ keep it up~! Keep it up~!!
hourly.2000: 8:00P.M. Admiral, wanna take a bath? Dinner? Or...wanna have Sa~ka~wa? Eh..? That's not good? Whyyy~!
hourly.2100: 9:00P.M. That's right...you should be tired now. How about a rest?
hourly.2200: 10:00P.M. Sakawa will be having her supper. Munch...munch...
hourly.2300: 11:00P.M. It's already 11 P.M.! Should we do a night battle then go to sleep soon?
